mapper.sql: ID, CONTENT, CROUTECODE, CUSERID, COMPLAINANT, TELNUM, ADDR, CTIME, CREATEID, HANDLEDEPTID, HANDLEID, RESULTS, STATUS, REMARKS, HANDLETIME, VISITTIME, SATISFY, ISVALID, LICENSECODE, CUSTNAME, TIMELIMIT, TYPE, AUDITID, REASON, MEASURE, LIMITATION, AUDITTIME, PREUSERID, PRESITUATION, PRETIME, SOURCE, VISITUSERID, RECORDERFILE, CHECKNOTE, VISITTYPE, CHECKUSERNAME, CREATENAME,PREUSERNAME,AUDITNAME,HANDLENAME,VISITNAME,CUSERNAME
c.* ,b.contentlist as typename,decode(c.source,'10','直接投诉','20','96368','直接投诉') as sourcename
mapper.select:
select from T_SQ_COMPLAINT c left join t_sys_basetypeinfo b on c.type=b.id
where c.licensecode like '%'||#{param.keyword}||'%' or c.CUSTNAME like '%'||#{param.keyword}||'%' or c.CROUTECODE like '%'||#{param.keyword}||'%'

select count(*) as ct from T_SQ_COMPLAINT c, t_sys_routeinfo r where c.croutecode=r.routecode and c.type=#{type} and r.deptid=#{deptid} and ( ctime between to_date(#{starttime},'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(#{endtime},'yyyy-mm-dd'))
mapper.insert: insert into T_SQ_COMPLAINT (ID, CONTENT, CROUTECODE, CUSERID, COMPLAINANT, TELNUM, ADDR, CTIME, CREATEID, HANDLEDEPTID, HANDLEID, RESULTS, STATUS, REMARKS, HANDLETIME, VISITTIME, SATISFY, ISVALID, LICENSECODE, CUSTNAME, TIMELIMIT, TYPE, AUDITID, REASON, MEASURE, LIMITATION, AUDITTIME, PREUSERID, PRESITUATION, PRETIME, SOURCE, VISITUSERID, RECORDERFILE, CHECKNOTE, VISITTYPE, CHECKUSERNAME ) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{croutecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{complainant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{handledeptid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{handleid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{results,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handletime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{visittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{satisfy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isvalid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licensecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timelimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{auditid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{measure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{limitation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{audittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{preuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{presituation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pretime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visituserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{recorderfile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checknote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visittype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update T_SQ_COMPLAINT
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CROUTECODE = #{croutecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSERID = #{cuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMPLAINANT = #{complainant,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELNUM = #{telnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDR = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTIME = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATEID = #{createid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HANDLEDEPTID = #{handledeptid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HANDLEID = #{handleid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RESULTS = #{results,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HANDLETIME = #{handletime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VISITTIME = #{visittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SATISFY = #{satisfy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISVALID = #{isvalid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LICENSECODE = #{licensecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTNAME = #{custname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIMELIMIT = #{timelimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AUDITID = #{auditid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEASURE = #{measure,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LIMITATION = #{limitation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUDITTIME = #{audittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PREUSERID = #{preuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRESITUATION = #{presituation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRETIME = #{pretime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SOURCE = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VISITUSERID = #{visituserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RECORDERFILE = #{recorderfile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECKNOTE = #{checknote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VISITTYPE = #{visittype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECKUSERNAME = #{checkusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATENAME = #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREUSERNAME = #{preusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUDITNAME = #{auditname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HANDLENAME = #{handlename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VISITNAME = #{visitname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSERNAME = #{cusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_SQ_COMPLAINT set CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CROUTECODE = #{croutecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSERID = #{cuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMPLAINANT = #{complainant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELNUM = #{telnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDR = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTIME = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATEID = #{createid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HANDLEDEPTID = #{handledeptid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HANDLEID = #{handleid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESULTS = #{results,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HANDLETIME = #{handletime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VISITTIME = #{visittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SATISFY = #{satisfy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISVALID = #{isvalid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LICENSECODE = #{licensecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTNAME = #{custname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIMELIMIT = #{timelimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AUDITID = #{auditid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEASURE = #{measure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LIMITATION = #{limitation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDITTIME = #{audittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PREUSERID = #{preuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRESITUATION = #{presituation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRETIME = #{pretime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SOURCE = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VISITUSERID = #{visituserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RECORDERFILE = #{recorderfile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECKNOTE = #{checknote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VISITTYPE = #{visittype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECKUSERNAME = #{checkusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
